meta.name: description
meta.content: An archive of clues and players for Jeopardy! show #6851.

td.p: Brian Loughnane, an investment operations manager from Scituate, Massachusetts
Debra Walsh, a retired accounting instructor from Morehead City, North Carolina
Julia Collins, a supply chain professional from Kenilworth, Illinois (whose 20-day cash winnings total $428,100)

tr.td: EASY BEING GREEN
WE MAKE THAT!
HAVE A COUNTY SEAT
HISTORIC PEOPLE IN ART
"BABY" ON BOARD
(Alex: And now, to mark the 75th anniversary of Little League, we have a whole category devoted to that subject.)

toggle('clue_J_1_1', 'clue_J_1_1_stuck', '(Julia: What is jade?)

emerald

JuliaDebra
')

tr.td: Julia

div.onmouseover:
toggle('clue_FJ', 'clue_FJ_stuck', '(Alex: [To Brian] [*], the author of The Cider House Rules. And he is our new champion with $22,600. Welcome to the winners\' level. And we\'re gonna miss Julia Collins. She\'s going away, though, with $428,000. We\'ll see her again in our Tournament of Champions. Well done, young lady.)
DebraWho is Stephen King?
$0
JuliaWho is Chabon?
$11,000
BrianWho is John Irving
$10,000
John Irving')

Julia
Debra
Brian

New champion: $22,600

body.div: The J! Archive is created by fans, for fans. The Jeopardy! game show and all elements thereof, including but not limited to copyright and trademark thereto, are the property of Jeopardy Productions, Inc. and are protected under law. This website is not affiliated with, sponsored by, or operated by Jeopardy Productions, Inc. Join the discussion at JBoard.tv.
